hots.title: Back button doesn't go back to last page.
hots.content:
[{"insert":"Hello, anonymous from the dfinity forum here.

Whenever I press the back button (on Android, Samsung Galaxy s22 ultra), I'm taken back to the previous site that I was on. 

For example: if I was on Google, then came to this site, opened a thread, then pressed back to go back to the metaforo homepage, I'd instead be sent back to Google, which back be quite frustrating. 

Can this be sorted out?
"}]

hots.title: This forum works (shows) however my own is not?
Unregister a Metamask based account
hots.content:
[{"attributes":{"background":"transparent"},"insert":"Hello,"},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent"},"insert":"I'd like to "unregister" this current account. I don't really use this Wallet-based account (using Metamask)."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent"},"insert":"It has only be created during the Beta test of Metaforo by ShapeShift and I don't really use it."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent"},"insert":"I use an Email-based one that was migrated (my whole post history is there) after the beta and I'd like to link my Metamask address to it, but if I try using the "Bind Ethereum Wallet" button and Sign the message, I get the error "The wallet address has been registered" since it's already used by the current account I'm using right now to write this message."},{"insert":"
"}]
